nyxvector-action-addsection:
Used in the NyxVector skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Talk:Main_Page|useskin=nyxvector}}
{{Identical|Add topic}}
nyxvector-action-delete:
Used in the NyxVector skin, as the name of a tab at the top of the page. See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=nyxvector}}

{{Identical|Delete}}
nyxvector-action-move:
Used in the NyxVector skin, on the tabs at the top of the page. See for example {{canonicalurl:Talk:Main_Page|useskin=nyxvector}}

{{Identical|Move}}
nyxvector-action-protect:
Tab at top of page, in nyxvector skin

{{Identical|Protect}}
nyxvector-action-undelete:
Tab at top of page, in nyxvector skin.
{{Identical|Undelete}}
nyxvector-action-unprotect:
Tab at top of page, in nyxvector skin.
{{Identical|Change protection}}
nyxvector-view-create:
Tab label in the NyxVector skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Foo|useskin=nyxvector}}
{{Identical|Create}}
nyxvector-view-edit:
Tab label in the NyxVector skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=nyxvector}}
{{Identical|Edit}}
nyxvector-view-history:
Tab label in the NyxVector skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=nyxvector}}
{{Identical|View history}}
nyxvector-view-view:
Tab label in the NyxVector skin (verb). See for example {{canonicalurl:Main_Page|useskin=nyxvector}}.
{{Identical|Read}}
nyxvector-view-viewsource:
Tab label in the NyxVector skin.
{{Identical|View source}}
nyxvector-more-actions: Label in the NyxVector skin's menu for the less-important or rarer actions which are not shown as tabs (like moving the page, or for sysops deleting or protecting the page), as well as (for users with a narrow viewing window in their browser) the less-important tab actions which the user's browser is unable to fit in. {{Identical|More}}
